definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. cstr. [[דְּרָכַיִם]] Pr 28:18 one crooked in ways (< pl., cf. Toy).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[עִקְּשׁז לָהֶס]] Is 59:8 their paths they have twisted. Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְעַקֵָּשׁזּ]] Mic 3:9 all that is straight they make crooked; Pt [[מְעַקֵּשׁ דְּרָכָיו]] Pr 10:9 (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיּעְקְשֵׁנִי]] Job 9:20 (Ges:§ 53 n) he hath declared me crooked, devious (in life).
